name: Company's name
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-1-task-2.png)

In 1997, company founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin approached Yahoo,
to sell their design, but were turned down.

Create a `nameOfCompany` variable and assign it the value `'Google'`.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const biggestOnlineShop = 'Amazon';
```
